name: Legend of Long Night
description: Legend of Long Night hearkens back to the golden age of online real-time strategy games. The game features current popular game trend and adds a survival mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3/AMD Athlon II, 2.0GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460/ATI Radeon HD 4250 with at least 512 MB video RAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible using the latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7, AMD Ryzen 7, 3.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660/ATI Radeon HD 6970 with at least 1024 MB video RAM DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible using the latest drivers
